divs: sighting detailsmy boyfriend and i were parking, way out in the country on a dark night in july (i think, could have been august) of 1967. we were listening to music and talking when all of a sudden, a bright, circular light appeared on the dashboard of the car, like one used at the time in movie theaters. it could only have come through the rear window, if it was a flashlight. tit was perfectly round. there were no lights visible around, none at all. a broken-down barn was about 1\2 mile behind us and it was totally dark. we were terribly startled because we thought someone was shining a flashlight in through the back window. we instantly turned to look back at the rear window and there was no one or nothing there, but upon turning back to the front of the car, the light was still there. we passed our hands over it and you couldn't see the light on our hands but you could still see it on the dashboard, and it remained there on the dashboard (right next to the radio) for maybe 20 seconds, then it sort of moved to the right and was gone. that circular light was approximately 3 inches across. there was no sound associated with this. nothing outside of the car could have been causing this light. we were really scared and my boyfriend quickly started the car and we raced up the gravel road to the paved county road, about 2 miles away. we stopped there, shaking, discussing it, asking ourselves, what in the heck was that. i looked out the passenger window and straight down, next to the road but looking like it was almost attached to the car was a small cloud of brightly colored sparkling lights, moving within the cloud, which looked like smoke, sort of. you could see through the cloud. that cloud and lights were maybe the size of basketball, probably a bit smaller. i said right then, it's following us. we tore out of that gravel road, and when we got to my house, in hawk point, mo, the lights hadn't followed us. we never saw them again. my boyfriend became my husband--we just celebrated our 40th anniversary, and we talk about this every now and then and we were convinced then, as now, that we were being observed. the cloud of lights followed us, we think. after that, we started hearing about possible ufo sightings in lincoln county, mo, and then there were cattle mutilations reported, also. i know it doesn't sound like much, but we were so frightened and then convinced, beyond doubt, that this light was not obeying the laws of physics as we know them. it was a round light on the dashboard which had no outside source and the lights which were down by the passenger door were unexplainable, too. we are sure it was something associated with a ufo or an observation.
Summary: A circular light appeared in our car then left, then colored lights followed us.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Hawk Point
This sighting has never been favorited.
